heading: Machine Learning Workshop
content: The AI/ML Workshop provides a comprehensive introduction to Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL), combining theoretical foundations with practical, hands-on experience. Key topics include neural networks, model training, and evaluation techniques. Participants will engage in a project-based learning session, where they will develop, train, and deploy ML models to address real-world challenges. This interactive approach ensures a deep understanding of AI/ML principles while equipping participants with the skills to independently apply these techniques in various domains.
shortcontent: The AI/ML Workshop provides a comprehensive introduction to Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL), combining theoretical foundations with practical, hands-on experience.

heading: Aeromodelling Workshop
content: The Aero-Modelling Workshop will be conducted by an external expert with extensive experience in aerodynamics and model aircraft design. This hands-on session will provide participants with the opportunity to build, test, and analyse model aircraft while gaining a deeper understanding of flight mechanics, control surfaces, and propulsion systems. Through interactive guidance, the expert will bridge theoretical concepts with real-world applications, ensuring a comprehensive learning experience. This workshop aims to foster curiosity, enhance technical skills, and provide participants with a strong foundation in aerospace principles.
shortcontent: The Aero-Modelling Workshop will be conducted by an external expert with extensive experience in aerodynamics and model aircraft design.

heading: DevOps Workshop
content: The DevOps Workshop offers an intermediate-level understanding of DevOps principles, focusing on seamless integration between development and operations for efficient software deployment. Participants will explore CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker, infrastructure as code, and monitoring tools. Hands-on sessions will provide practical experience in automating workflows, improving system reliability, and streamlining deployment processes.
shortcontent: The DevOps Workshop offers an intermediate-level understanding of DevOps principles, focusing on seamless integration between development and operations for efficient software deployment.
